about_the_game:
[ Server Closed ]

Sorry but Server is closed now.

Genre: Fantasy real-time action RPG game

Indie MMORPG game,
Constantine! Do Adventure And be strong!

The Constantine is a world that exists inside Nathan's tree.
After spring, summer, autumn and winter, the world goes to sleep.

Level up the most in a year, collect the most money, win the most battles, etc.
Achieve your goals and leave your name in the rankings.

1. Catch monsters, get items, money, and experience!
When you accumulate experience points, you can level up, and when you change jobs at a certain level, you can acquire skills.

[ Key Description ]
1) Direction keys (↑↓←→) to move, Space to attack, and Z to pick up items.
2) Shortcuts can be modified as desired.
3) Chat is the Enter key.
4) To talk to the NPC, click it with the mouse.

Equip items (swords, bows, hats) and hit the world!

2. There are 4 major job changes.

Warrior, Mage, Rogue, Archer.

Warrior: Use high HP and armor to deal with monsters in the forefront.

Wizard: Defeat multiple enemies with elemental magic and area magic. Protects allies through castle attribute magic

Rogue: Specializes in 1v1 attacks and secures mobility through utility skills. Deals more damage to debuffed opponents.

Archer: Weak HP, but strong against long-range attacks. Debuff skills can be used to make opponents vulnerable.

Catch boss monsters with your colleagues using skills appropriate for each class!

3. If you get a rare item, you will be able to feel different from others.

Explore the wide world and meet many friends!



[Guide after starting the game]

[Sign Up]

1) Enter the ID and Password you want to create.
2) Click the Register button at the bottom.
(Your ID and password are not encrypted. Please enter a password that only you know, but you don't mind being exposed to the outside world.
ex. 12345132 etc.)
3) If "creation succeeded!" appears in the text above, membership registration is complete.

​[Login]

1) Enter the ID and Password to log in.
2) Click the Login button on the right.
3) Select a server. (Connect to the Int(X) Skaia(O) server.)

[When starting for the first time]

​1) Since the character creation window appears, select the desired nickname and appearance and click the Create button at the bottom.
2) Direction keys (↑↓←→) to move, Space to attack, and Z to pick up items.
3) Shortcuts can be modified as desired.
4) Chat is the Enter key.
5) To talk to the NPC, click it with the mouse.

[When you want to quit]

​1) Click the Exit button at the bottom right to log out and move to the login window.
2) If you want to exit, press the X window in the upper right corner.
(For full screen, press Alt+Enter and press X window!)

name: Constantine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: realtek
